body: The constellation, [ Good Chalice O' Sauce Enthusiast ] simply startled that the content 'went a little overboard' twist noticed it again.
Emperor approves

After reading this again, it is clear she is just paying her friend to shut up about her secret work habit with her uncle. As for the rest, well he should've done more detective work before calling her on some "ho" shit. Just because you see two people walk into a hotel room doesn't always mean they are fucking unless someone is wearing more than causal clothes. Overall, nice story.

@SatanicBeef, I think it's just that these are like two different routes in a VN. Neither doujin ends with "continued," they both have "end," and the titles "Real Edition" and "Twisted Edition" lend to the idea that they're just two different stories from the same scenario/characters.
